channel.title: Comments on: Episode #167: The Broader Economy III

item.title: By: Alina
item.dc:creator: Alina
item.description: It is very interesting! Really want to know the opinion of the speaker about tne news that TOBAM, a French company with $9 bln assets under management, launched the first Bitcoin mutual fund to provide institutional investors an opportunity to invest in cryptocurrency. I've known this informationin this post - https://t.me/yoken/153
